EmailTemplate.name: 201707_Global_Event_C150OdysseyReception_mih.201707_Global_Event_C150Odyssey_Sav
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: C150GO-Honeywell Reception in Vancouver
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SAVE THE DATE Please join us... Date July 30, 2017 (Date/time subject to change due to flight schedule)
Time 6 p.m. to 8 p.m.
Location Vancouver Harbor Heliport (CBC7), Vancouver, B.C.
Save the date for a reception honoring the Denglers’ C150GO <[[http://c150go.ca/]]> Bell 429 helicopter circumnavigation and the Honeywell Aspire 200 communications hardware and GoDirect Cabin Connectivity Service. Hear from the Denglers about their journey and how the Honeywell hardware and service package is allowing them to share their adventures with the world.
Stay tuned for more details on venue. Questions? Contact Rob Richardson at Robert.richardson@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Robert.richardson@honeywell.com]]> or 602-363-2264.
Note: The date is slated based on the Denglers’ current flight plan. The date may shift slightly based on their schedule.
